## Description {#details}

A pass which prints the call graph to a <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a></code>.

This is primarily useful for testing the analysis.

Definition at line 1285 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/lazycallgraph-h">LazyCallGraph.h</a>.
